The longest is: %s
 length=%d
",longest,max); return 0; } int mygetline(char s[],int lim) { int c,i; for(i=0;i<lim-1 && (c=getchar())!=EOF && c!='
';++i) s[i]=c; if(c=='
') { s[i]=c; ++i; } s[i]='\0'; return i; } void copy(char to[],char from[]) { int i; i=0; while((to[i]=from[i])!='\0') ++i; } 09.29 è¯¾å ‚ç»ƒä¹ ä¾‹3 ç»Ÿè®¡ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸ªæ•° #include<stdio.h> #define MAXLENGTH 1000 int mystrlen(char s[]); int main() { char mystring[MAXLENGTH]; int len; scanf("%s",mystring); len=mystrlen(mystring); printf("Len=%d

",be); printf("ba=%d
",ba); printf("ta=%d
",ta); printf("ne=%d

",vt); printf("re=%d
",re); return 0; } ä¾‹5 æµ‹é‡é™¤æ³•ã€æ±‚ä½™æ“ä½œ #include<stdio.h> int main() { int a,b; a=5; b=2; printf("a=%d b=%d a/b=%d a%%b=%d
",a,b,a/b,a%b); a=-5; b=2; printf("a=%d b=%d a/b=%d a%%b=%d
",a,b,a/b,a%b); return 0; }
